request.positivePrompt: Scene: Inside the Whispering Forest with mossy ground, soft dappled twilight filtering through leaves. Characters: Alexander (casual layered hoodie and sleeveless zip vest, energetic pose), Adrian (hoodie over white crewneck, attentive listening pose), Hase Hoppel (white rabbit with ethereal white aura). Action: Hase Hoppel pointing with his paw toward a silver light-trail that winds toward a dark pond; Alexander kneeling, touching moss; Adrian cupping his ear, listening. Lighting: cool green-blue forest shadows with a thin silver path of light glowing across the undergrowth, pond surface reflecting deep navy and swallowing light. Mood: suspenseful and quiet, camera at eye-level to the children. Environment specifics: slick algae-covered stepping stones across the pond, background of dense ferns and crooked tree trunks, sounds visualized as thin lines, recurring motifs: the silver light trail and a small hummed melody (recurring motif). Art style: watercolor illustration, Axel Scheffler style, warm colours, child-friendly. CHARACTERS IN THIS SCENE: Alexander: 8-10 years old, male, medium brown short straight with slight wave tousled, slightly spiky at crown hair, bright green eyes, light warm peach skin, wearing casual layered hoodie and sleeveless zip vest, short tousled brown hair, large bright green eyes, round youthful face, rosy button nose, small smiling mouth, light freckles and blush, slim neck and shoulders, expressive arched eyebrows, soft natural lighting Adrian: 5-7 years old, male, warm golden blond short curly voluminous tousled curls hair, bright blue eyes, pale peach skin, wearing casual hoodie over white crewneck shirt, voluminous curly golden hair, large expressive bright blue eyes, rosy round childlike cheeks, small button-shaped nose, gentle small smiling mouth, prominent rounded ears slightly visible, soft pale warm skin, innocent empathetic friendly expression Hase Hoppel: Hase Hoppel â€¢ ['Hase Hoppel rabbit', ' medium-sized'] IMPORTANT: Characters listed from youngest to oldest. Maintain size relationships - Alexander (8-10y) must be SMALLER than any older character. Art style: watercolor illustration, Axel Scheffler style, warm colours, child-friendly
